name: Flame
description:
You are the new-born phoenix, Flame. Your goal is to reach to top of the mountain you were born on, and regain your strength by completing the challenges you face ahead. You are able to survive being killed as long as your not to hasty. 

Made for https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-81-kaiju.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - to Move

Click - to Fly
